interpretation: The "gloves" card represents protection and caution. It advises you to be mindful of your surroundings and to take necessary precautions to avoid harm. This card could also suggest that you may need to protect yourself emotionally or mentally. It may be necessary to put up some boundaries or distance yourself from certain people or situations. The gloves are also a symbol of preparation and readiness. This card encourages you to be prepared for any challenges that may come your way. It is a reminder that sometimes you need to be equipped with the right tools to face the world. Associated keywords include safety, caution, boundaries, preparation, and protection.
